item.title: What You Risk Reveals What You Value.

item.title: You Can Have Everything You Want, Just Not at the Same Time, and if You Think that’s Unfortunate, Consider That if You Had Everything at Once, You wouldn’t Really Experience or Enjoy it Completely.
